it.polimi.automata.io.in

Class ModelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.action.CHIAAction<O>
      • it.polimi.automata.io.in.XMLReader<IBA>
        • it.polimi.automata.io.in.ModelReader

  • public class ModelReader
extends XMLReader<IBA>
    contains the reader which is used to read an Incomplete Buchi automaton
    Author:
    claudiomenghi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelReader(File file)
      creates a new Buchi automaton reader which can be used to read a Buchi automaton through the method.

      creates a new IBAReader which reads the file from the specified path

      • ModelReader

        public ModelReader(File file)
        creates a new Buchi automaton reader which can be used to read a Buchi automaton through the method. See ClaimReader.perform()
        Parameters:
        file - is the reader from which the Buchi automaton must be loaded
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the parameters is null
